message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - lombok.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'javax.sql.DataSource' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.time.LocalDateTime' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController'.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity.notFound' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity.ok' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Top-level class PostController has to reside in its own source file.
Top-level class PostRepository has to reside in its own source file.
Top-level class Post has to reside in its own source file.
